name: Baldric's Quest
description:
Description

Baldric's Quest is a fast-paced hack 'n slash arcade game. You play as Baldric, a young warrior, who set sails toward Wyrm Island to stop an evil wizard. The evil wizard has trapped the winter itself to use his wicked magic and so the whole kingdom is suffering from endless summer. Succesfully completing the task Baldric nees to upgrade his gear and find to way to overcome the terrible monsters he encounters during his journey.

Supports and tested with Xbox 360, Xbox One and PS4 controllers. PS4 buttons has to be configured via in game options menu or via config file.
